name: Advance Payment
query:
SELECT name "Booking:Link/Accommodation Booking:130", guest_name "Guest::220", mobile_no "Mobile::100", checked_in "CheckIn:Date:90", advance_amount "Advance Paid:Currency:130"
FROM `tabAccommodation Booking`  WHERE status IN ('Checked In', 'Booked') AND company = %(company)s AND checked_in >= %(from_date)s and checked_in <= %(to_date)s
